issue.title: [CF 535] Check enemys roles in BG (Through score tab)
issue.body:
Hello I am French, sorry for my bad English.

Please add the possibility to check the enemys roles using the score tab. Thank for your great add-on.


> Posted by CurseForge user Leblanco | Imported from CurseForge issue #535 | Raw

comments.body:
